duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop detailed design documents for power distribution, lighting, and grounding systems for power generation, manufacturing, and industrial facilities.
Serve as a technical resource on complex designs and advanced engineering theories.
Model and conduct power systems analysis, including short circuit, load flow, protective relay coordination, and arc flash analysis.
Interface with key client and project staff in formal, informal and project team meetings.
Plan, organize, and supervise work of designers and administrative staff supporting assignments.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Electrical Engineering with three or more years of electrical design experience (PE license preferred)
